RawLine: TNPC_08005201,記住了，是{color=#FF0000}不會謝的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不膩的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生蟲的糖{/color}。,记住了，是{color=#FF0000}不会谢的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不腻的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生虫的糖{/color}。

Items.r: 記住了，是{color=#FF0000}不會謝的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不膩的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生蟲的糖{/color}。
Items.c: 記住了,是不會謝的花、喝不膩的酒、不生蟲的糖。
Items.mt: Remember, it's the flower that doesn't give up, the wine that doesn't get tired, and the sugar that doesn't get wormed.

Items.r: 记住了，是{color=#FF0000}不会谢的花{/color}、{color=#FF0000}喝不腻的酒{/color}、{color=#FF0000}不生虫的糖{/color}。
